manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enhance fragrance and softness The agitation, spinning, and heat of the laundry process can damage clothes at the fiber level.Use clearalif laundry softener sheets to reduce damage caused by fiber friction,Enhance softness. Antistatic Property During daily use, clothes rub against each other and cause static electricity, CLEARALIF softener sheets combat static and soften fabrics.

Fabric FIber Damage Protect Reduce fiber friction to reduce fiber damage and protect fiber color. Keep your clothes bright and colorful. Fight Static Electricity Fabric softener sheets combat static and soften fabrics.

Travel laundry set Convenient for travel and compact in size, taking up minimal space in your luggage. No need for measuring No need to measure the dosage as it comes pre-cut. The laundry set is designed to provide up to 160 loads. No plastic pollution Utilize more green packaging materials and bioenzyme cleaning agents. A good gift idea It is a perfect gift that adds creativity to a green lifestyle.

Why choose CLEARALIF laundry sheets? Developing green and useful products is what we are going after. Plastic and chemical pollution are serious problems that concern us all.We use green ingredients such as surfactants and enzymes to prevent chemical pollution.We employ decomposable packaging to combat plastic consumption.With compression technology, we removed the liquid in our products and made them more portable, which enables us to simplify packaging. Therefore, we can transport more goods at one time to save fuel and reduce carbon emission.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Surprised that I like these
reviews.reviewText: I don't usually use fabric softener, it's a pain and waste of space so it's just easier to skip it. I figured these were worth a try, and to my surprise I actually like them. My clothes are noticeably softer. I wash in exclusively cold water, and they desolve well in my front load h.e. washing machine. I like that they're unscented, because they don't mess with the scent of my detergent or laundry booster. The do say that they "boost scent" and I don't notice any change in that sense. They are a little crumbly, which makes them a little annoying to get out of the box sometimes, but they're still better than liquid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’d rate these fabric softener sheets as just ok. They dissolve well even in cold water. They are more eco friendly than traditional drier sheets since there is nothing left to throw away. They are easier to use (especially when traveling) than liquid fabric softeners. My clothes don’t feel noticeably different than when I use traditional dryer sheets so I’d say they perform similarly in that regard. There is no noticeable scent to me. However, contrary to claims, they do not seem to mitigate static at all. Overall, these fabric softener sheets are fine but if you are looking to minimize static I’d look elsewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wanted something other than the liquid messy crap, so I tried these. They work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Update: After using this product regularly, I had a one-time (so far) faux pas with it. After the washing cycle ended and I began to put the clothes in the dryer, one of my items had a big white gelatinous glob of the fabric softener sheet stuck to the item. Not sure how this happened but it did require an extra scrubbing in the sink to remove it. Hopefully, this is just a one-time event.I learn something new every day. I was well aware of the laundry sheets but did not know about these fabric softener sheets. They work just as well as the laundry sheets and make life much easier. You just throw a laundry sheet (that cleans) and a fabric softener sheet (that softens) in with your laundry load and voila, all done! I love that these are zero waste, no plastic bottles or anything left over except for a box that can biodegrade in the compost easily. There's also no pouring of liquids which sometimes makes a mess. The only thing that could be improved is that they all stick to each other in the box and it's hard sometimes to just pull out one. Glad I found this product that works just as well as its liquid counterpart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unscented sheets | Great addition to my laundry
reviews.reviewText: Ever since I started using these fabric softener sheets, my clothes thank me every time I use them.These sheets are environmentally friendly since they do not contain any plastic, dissolve in the water thoroughly without leaving any residue.The perforation on each sheet allows to divide the sheet in half for smaller loads. I typically have big loads so I end up using one whole sheet each time and my clothes come out softer and fresher.Since these sheets are unscented, it does not add any scent to the clothes. These sheets are a wonderful addition to my laundry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and effective
reviews.reviewText: These fabric softener sheets are an eco-friendly way to keep your clothes soft. You put them in the washing machine on top of your clothes before the cycle starts. They dissolve and add softness while the clothes are going through the wash cycle. I found them very easy to use and they did make my clothes feel nice. I would’ve preferred a little more scent. The box says that there is a scent booster in there, but I find these to be very, very lightly scented. But they do work well, and I would likely buy them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I'm so happy that fabric softener sheets that go in the washer are finally available! No more messing with carrying heavy plastic bottles home from the store, no measuring, no spilling, and no need for dryer sheets anymore either. These fabric softener sheets are unscented, but they still have a light fresh smell. I love being able to toss a sheet into the washer along with a laundry detergent sheet, and everything dissolves well and without leaving any residue behind. My clothes come out soft and less wrinkled when using these sheets and there's no waste to go to the landfill. These are like laundry sheets in that the number of uses you get will depend on the size of the wash loads you run since the directions call for 1/2 sheet for small loads, a full sheet for regular loads, and two sheets for an extra-large load. The next time I take a trip it will be easy to pack these along with some detergent sheets in a baggie for doing laundry in the hotel. Easy to use and work well!
